Member Function Documentation

void GLApp::draw (   )  [virtual]
 

calls the draw-function of the main-widget

AGApplication::draw() calls the draw-function of the mainWidget and cares about drawing a custom mouse-cursor, the tooltip and possible overlays. At the end the screen-buffer is flipped.

Reimplemented from AGApplication.
